---
category: news
title: "Machine learning in spectral domain"
excerpt: "Theoretical aspects of automated learning from data involving deep neural networks have open questions. Here Giambagli et al. show that training the neural networks in the spectral domain of the network coupling matrices can reduce the amount of learning parameters and improve the pre-training process."
publishedDateTime: 2021-02-26T18:08:00Z
